Saudi Arabian woman think great risk vitamin D deficiency due darker skin type great likelihood reduce UVB radiation exposure . However , lack data regard vitamin D status Saudi Arabian woman may relate breast cancer risk . Design : A case-control study conduct among 120 breast cancer case 120 control . The study population drawn patient admit King Fahd Hospital Jeddah , Saudi Arabia June August 2009 . Participants complete questionnaire diet medical history serum sample collect woman measure circulate 25 ( OH ) D concentration .
